Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for....”
Reviews.Author: williamj38
Reviews.Content: deal hotelscom 54 night deal average bad except doors flimsy door knobs easily overpowered deadbolt constantly worried breaking gone location ultimate advantage extreme downfall loud restaurant downstairs starts packing midnite 2am bangs half hour moving tables benches platforms inside bars downstairs crazy loud businesses pdc blaring music 201 301 sleep internet okay staff somewhat friendly glad time move property
